sources.title: Break (Otryv) | Full Movie | Action Adventure Survival
sources.description:
Break (Otryv) - On a winter break in the Urals, a merry band of sporty twenty-something friends, three boys and two girls make their way to an old funicular to have an unforgettable New Year's Eve celebration at the top of the mountain. A fun adventure turns into a nightmare when the cable car grinds to a halt over the abyss. Sub-zero temperatures, confinement, height and fear of a slow death creats conflict and further calamities as they fight for survival.
2019.  Stars: Irina Antonenko, Andrey Nazimov, Denis Kosyakov
